title: One Piece Episode 341 Recap
author: Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap of Episode 341 covering Nami's attack by Absalom, Luffy's group landing on Thriller Bark, and the Surprise Zombies encounter. The blogger notes this became their most-read article.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains references to later Thriller Bark episodes including Nami vs Absalom

engagement.note: Author noted this became their most-read article

title: 340-341: 'The Man Called a Genius! Hogback Makes His Appearance!' and 'Nami's in a Major Pinch! The Zombie Mansion and the Invisible Man!'

description: A combined recap of episodes 340 and 341 from a first-time One Piece viewer's perspective, providing fresh reactions to the controversial Absalom scene.

title: 10 Problematic One Piece Scenes That Don't Hold Up on a Rewatch

description: An article examining controversial scenes in One Piece including Absalom's assault on Nami in Episode 341, discussing why these scenes are problematic in modern context.
